channel.title: Compiler problem?
channel.description:
This is my compile code.
[code]@echo off title Compiling... cd src javac -cp . -d ../bin/ ./*java pause[/code]
This is the error I get.
[code]'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
The base is PI is it makes any difference.
THANKS!

item.title: Compiler problem?
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

If your going to make a rsps u should have environmental variables set already…

item.title: Compiler problem?
item.dc:creator: @Fire_capez Fire capez
item.description:
@Fire_capez wrote:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,595833.0.html please don’t make multiple threads, you simply need to set your classpath: http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/essential/environment/paths.html

Read full topic

item.description:

javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Compiler problem?
item.dc:creator: @h2k h2k
item.description:
@h2k wrote:

@echo off Title Compile "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_09\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

there you go

Read full topic
